billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to establish and implement a no fare program for children attending public school in the city district of the city
summary: Directs the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to establish and implement a no fare rate program for children attending public school in the city district of the city of New York.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          492

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GIBSON, CAMARA, CASTRO, COLTON, CRESPO, DINOWITZ,
         JEFFRIES,  MENG,  ORTIZ,  J. RIVERA,  ROSENTHAL,  SCARBOROUGH,  TITUS,
         WRIGHT -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. BARRON, DenDEKKER, GOTTFRIED,
         HEASTIE, MAYERSOHN -- read once  and  referred  to  the  Committee  on
         Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to directing the
         metropolitan  transportation authority to establish and implement a no
         fare program for children attending public school in the city district
         of the city of New York

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  1266 of the public authorities law is amended by
    2  adding a new subdivision 19 to read as follows:
    3    19. NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISIONS OF LAW OR THE  TERMS  OF  ANY
    4  CONTRACT,  THE AUTHORITY, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE NEW YORK CITY TRANSIT
    5  AUTHORITY, THE LONG ISLAND RAIL ROAD AND THE METRO-NORTH COMMUTER  RAIL-
    6  ROAD COMPANY, SHALL ESTABLISH AND IMPLEMENT A NO FARE PROGRAM FOR TRANS-
    7  PORTATION  ON  NEW  YORK CITY TRANSIT AUTHORITY SYSTEMS, THE LONG ISLAND
    8  RAIL ROAD AND THE METRO-NORTH COMMUTER RAILROAD COMPANY FOR PRIMARY  AND
    9  SECONDARY  SCHOOL-AGED CHILDREN ATTENDING SCHOOL IN THE CITY DISTRICT OF
   10  THE CITY OF NEW YORK.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
   12  it shall have become a law, provided, however, that any rules and  regu-
   13  lations  necessary  for  the  timely  implementation  of this act on its
   14  effective date shall be promulgated on or before such date.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00186-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to directing the metropolitan transportation authority to establish and implement a no fare program for children attending public school in the city district of the city of New York
